content: hello this is the description for a round textured crochet doily called arya the pdf file includes written instructions for each round with a detailed explanation of all special stitches chart for each round step by step photo tutorial more details the pattern uses russia terminology difficulty level advanced the pattern consists of 25 rounds recommended materials size 10 cotton thread and hook 1 50 mm using the recommended materials this pattern will take approximately 240-350 m of thread the finished doily will be approximately 32 sm after blocking stitches and terms used fp/bp stitches popcorns puff stitches clusters crab stitch picot the pattern is for personal use only no part of the description may be copied or redistributed i give permission to sell finished products in small quantities using my pattern with an indication of my authorship instagram @natalia_lapshina_doily written and tested by ekaterina lukonina instagram @ teplo vnutri_hobbi tested by ludmila kirilyk instagram @crochet_doilies_ thank you for purchasing and enjoy crocheting
